messages.title: It's Lib Dem or Conservative here in Sheffield Hallam
messages.content: Only the Lib Dems can beat the Conservatives in Sheffield Hallam. Voting Labour or Green will just help the Conservatives in our area.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg has a national voice to help make Sheffield a fairer place where local people make a real difference in their community.
Backing real and rigorous action for the environment from saving green spaces to boosting recycling and local services.
Nick Clegg and the Lib Dems have a fully costed plan that will cut taxes for ordinary families and will pump frontline NHS services with more money.
The Lib Dems will deliver a brighter future by investing in improving schools and taking real action on climate change.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can beat the Conservatives in Sheffield Hallam. Voting Labour or Green will just help the Conservatives in our area.

quotes.text: Labour has failed Sheffield and the Conservatives can't be trusted to change things for the better.
Only the Liberal Democrats can deliver real change and fairness.

images.caption: It's Lib Dem or Conservative here in Sheffield Hallam
